text: Akhi Alamgir () (born January 7, 1975) is a Bangladeshi singer and actress. She won the Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Child Artist for her performance in the movie Bhat De (1984) and Best Female Playback Singer for the movie Ekti Cinemar Golpo (2018) by Bangladesh government. According to 2016, she has released 18 albums. She is the daughter of actor-director Alamgir. ==References== Category:Bangladeshi singers Category:1975 births Category:Living people
title: Akhi Alamgir
